message.content:
cs.CG, cs.GR, cs.CV, cs.HC, cs.SI. 

The paper deals with the problem of assigning colors to vertices of a geometric graph, which is a topic that falls under computational geometry (cs.CG) and graph drawing (cs.GR). The use of perceptual metrics in color space also suggests a connection to computer vision (cs.CV) and human-computer interaction (cs.HC). Finally, the application of the work to a distributed load-balancing visualization problem suggests a connection to scientific computing and simulation (cs.SI).
